title: Topic 001 Question 518
body: An application uses an Amazon RDS MySQL DB instance. The RDS database is becoming low on disk space. A solutions architect wants to increase the disk space without downtime.
Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST amount of effort?
options: Increase the RDS database instance size
Change the RDS database instance storage type to Provisioned IOPS
Back up the RDS database, increase the storage capacity, restore the database, and stop the previous instance
